lead_paragraph: Thomas De Gendt of Belgium won the mountainous fourth stage of the Volta a Cataluña while Nairo Quintana of Colombia took the overall lead after surpassing his title rivals in the Pyrenees Mountains, in Spain.

headline.print_headline: Colombian Takes the Lead in Spain
headline.main: Colombian Takes the Lead in Spain

snippet: Thomas De Gendt of Belgium won the mountainous fourth stage of the Volta a Cataluña while Nairo Quintana of Colombia took the overall lead after surpassing his title rivals in the Pyrenees Mountains, in Spain.
abstract: Colombian Nairo Quintana takes overall lead in Volta a Cataluna; Belgian Thomas De Gendt wins fourth stage of race.
